response.original_title: No Body and the Blue Sky
response.overview: A poetic journey along the Bzhuzhi River guides us through six villages in the Georgian region of Guria. The film shows us the relationship the inhabitants have with the Bzhuzhi River and how everyday life revolves around it.
response.tagline: A poetic journey along the Bzhuzhi River guides us through six villages in the Georgian region of Guria.
response.title: No Body and the Blue Sky
